title: This Video Choked Up Bert + Is It Rude To Give Your Ex A Break-Up Gift?
description:
After five months together, your boyfriend decides it's time to end your relationship. But before he walks out of your life, he gives you an expensive gift. Would you keep the gift or not?
But first, Bert shares a great story that choked him up. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
